entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Arviat
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
